workflow.name: Automate event RSVPs with email validation & badge generation using VerifiEmail & HTMLCssToImage
workflow.description:
# Validated RSVP Confirmation with Automated Badge Generation

### **Overview:**

This comprehensive workflow automates the entire event RSVP process from form submission to attendee confirmation, including real-time email validation and personalized digital badge generation.

### **‚ú® KEY FEATURES**:
‚Ä¢ Real-time Email Validation - Verify attendee emails using VerifiEmail API to prevent fake registrations

‚Ä¢ Automated Badge Generation - Create beautiful, personalized event badges with attendee details

‚Ä¢ Smart Email Routing - Send confirmation emails with badges for valid emails, rejection notices for invalid ones

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Logging - Track all RSVPs (both valid and invalid) in Google Sheets for analytics

‚Ä¢ Dual Path Logic - Handle valid and invalid submissions differently with conditional branching

‚Ä¢ Anti-Fraud Protection - Detect disposable emails and invalid domains automatically

### **üîß WORKFLOW COMPONENTS:**

1. Webhook Trigger - Receives RSVP submissions
2. Email Validation - Verifies email authenticity using VerifiEmail API
3. Conditional Logic - Separates valid from invalid submissions
4. Badge Creator - Generates HTML-based personalized event badges
5. Image Converter - Converts HTML badges to shareable PNG images using HTMLCssToImage
6. Email Sender - Delivers confirmation with badge or rejection notice via Gmail
7. Data Logger - Records all attempts in Google Sheets for tracking and analytics

### **üéØ PERFECT FOR**:
‚Ä¢ Conference organizers managing hundreds of RSVPs
‚Ä¢ Corporate event planners requiring verified attendee lists
‚Ä¢ Webinar hosts preventing fake registrations
‚Ä¢ Workshop coordinators issuing digital badges
‚Ä¢ Community event managers tracking attendance

### **üí° BENEFITS:**
‚Ä¢ Reduces manual verification time by 95%
‚Ä¢ Eliminates fake email registrations
‚Ä¢ Creates professional branded badges automatically
‚Ä¢ Provides real-time RSVP tracking and analytics
‚Ä¢ Improves attendee experience with instant confirmations
‚Ä¢ Maintains clean, verified contact lists

### **üõ†Ô∏è REQUIRED SERVICES:**
‚Ä¢ n8n (cloud or self-hosted)
‚Ä¢ VerifiEmail API (https://verifi.email)
‚Ä¢ HTMLCssToImage API (https://htmlcsstoimg.com)
‚Ä¢ Gmail account (OAuth2)
‚Ä¢ Google Sheets

### **üìà USE CASE SCENARIO:**
When someone submits your event RSVP form, this workflow instantly validates their email, generates a personalized badge with their details, and emails them a confirmation‚Äîall within seconds. Invalid emails receive a helpful rejection notice, and every submission is logged for your records. No manual work required!

### **üé® BADGE CUSTOMIZATION:**
The workflow includes a fully customizable HTML badge template featuring:
‚Ä¢ Gradient background with modern design
‚Ä¢ Attendee name, designation, and organization
‚Ä¢ Event name and date
‚Ä¢ Email address and validation timestamp
‚Ä¢ Google Fonts (Poppins) for professional typography

### **üìä ANALYTICS INCLUDED:**
Track metrics like:
‚Ä¢ Total RSVPs received
‚Ä¢ Valid vs invalid email ratio
‚Ä¢ Event-wise registration breakdown
‚Ä¢ Temporal patterns
‚Ä¢ Organization/company distribution

###  **‚ö° PERFORMANCE:**
‚Ä¢ Processing time: ~3-5 seconds per RSVP
‚Ä¢ Scales to handle 100+ concurrent submissions
‚Ä¢ Email delivery within 10 seconds
‚Ä¢ Real-time Google Sheets updates

### **üîÑ EASY SETUP:**
1. Import the workflow JSON
2. Configure your credentials (detailed instructions included)
3. Create your form with required fields (name, email, event, designation, organization)
4. Connect the webhook
5. Activate and start receiving validated RSVPs!

### **üéì LEARNING VALUE:**
This workflow demonstrates:
‚Ä¢ Webhook integration patterns
‚Ä¢ API authentication methods
‚Ä¢ Conditional workflow branching
‚Ä¢ HTML-to-image conversion
‚Ä¢ Email automation best practices
‚Ä¢ Data logging strategies
‚Ä¢ Error handling techniques

---

parameters.content:
## üîê CREDENTIALS SETUP REQUIRED

**Before activating this workflow, configure:**

1. **VerifiEmail API**
   - Sign up at https://verifi.email
   - Get your API key from dashboard

2. **HTMLCssToImage**
   - Sign up at https://htmlcsstoimg.com
   - Get User ID & API Key

3. **Gmail Account**
   - Use OAuth2 authentication

4. **Google Sheets**
   - Create spreadsheet: Event_RSVP_Tracker

## üì• STEP 1: WEBHOOK TRIGGER

**What it does:**
- Receives RSVP form submissions from Jotform
- Captures attendee information in real-time

**Expected Data:**
```
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "test@gmail.com",
  "event": "TechCon 2025",
  "designation": "Engineer",
  "organization": "ABC Corp"
}
```

## ‚úÖ STEP 2: EMAIL VALIDATION

**What it does:**
- Validates email addresses using VerifiEmail API
- Checks if email is real, active, and not disposable

**API Response Fields:**
- valid: "true" or "false"
- email: The validated email
- disposable: true/false (temporary emails)

## ‚öñÔ∏è STEP 3: CONDITIONAL BRANCH

**TRUE Path (Green):**
1. Prepare badge data
2. Generate image
3. Send confirmation email
4. Log to Google Sheets
5. Notify organizer

**FALSE Path (Red):**
1. Send rejection email
2. Log failed attempt to Sheets

assignments.name: html_badge

parameters.content:
## üé® STEP 4: PREPARE BADGE DATA

**What it does:**
- Consolidates all attendee data
- Creates HTML template for badge
- Formats data for image generation

**Data Fields Set:**
- name, email, event
- designation, organization
- validation_score
- html_badge (full HTML template)

## üñºÔ∏è STEP 5: GENERATE BADGE IMAGE

**What it does:**
- Converts HTML badge to PNG image
- Uses HTMLCssToImage API
- Returns shareable image URL

**Request Body:**
- html: The badge HTML template
- google_fonts: Font families to load
- device_scale: 2 (for high resolution)

parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.name }},

Thank you for confirming your RSVP for {{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.event }}! üéâ

Here's your personalized event badge:

Event Details:

  • Event:{{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.event }}
  • Name:{{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.name }}
  • Designation: {{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.designation }}
  • Organization:{{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.organization }}

We look forward to seeing you there!

This is an automated confirmation. Please save this email for your records.
Powered by n8n Automation
parameters.subject: =‚úÖ Your RSVP for {{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.event }} is Confirmed!

parameters.content:
## üìß STEP 6: SEND CONFIRMATION EMAIL

**What it does:**
- Sends personalized confirmation to attendee
- Includes generated badge image
- Provides event details recap

**Email Components:**
- Professional HTML design
- Embedded badge image
- Event information summary
- Clear call-to-action
- Footer with branding

## üìä STEP 7: LOG TO GOOGLE SHEETS

**What it does:**
- Records all confirmed RSVPs
- Creates audit trail
- Enables analytics and reporting

**Google Sheets Setup:**
1. Create spreadsheet: Event_RSVP_Tracker
2. Add column headers (Row 1):
   - Timestamp | Name | Email | Event
   - Designation | Organization
   - Badge_URL | Status

parameters.message:
=

‚ö†Ô∏è RSVP Verification Issue

Hello {{ $('Webhook - RSVP Form Submission').item.json.body.name }},

We received your RSVP submission, but we couldn't verify the email address you provided:

Email: {{ $json.email }}

Possible reasons:

  • The email address may contain a typo
  • The email domain might not exist
  • Temporary email services are not accepted

Please double-check your email address and submit the RSVP form again.

If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.

Event Management Team
parameters.subject: ‚ö†Ô∏è RSVP Verification Failed

parameters.content:
## üö´ STEP 9: HANDLE INVALID EMAILS

**Rejection Email Features:**
- Clear error explanation
- Helpful troubleshooting tips
- Support contact information
- Professional tone
- Resubmission instructions

**Common Invalid Reasons:**
- Email typos/misspellings
- Non-existent domain
- Disposable email services
- Syntax errors
- Blocked domains

## üìä STEP 10: LOG FAILED ATTEMPTS

**What it does:**
- Records all invalid email attempts
- Creates comprehensive audit trail
- Enables failure analysis

**Logged Data:**
- All submission data
- Badge_URL: N/A
- Status: Failed - Invalid Email

user.name: Jitesh Dugar
user.bio: AI Automation Specialist - OpenAI, CRM & Automation Expert with a solid understanding of various tools that include Zapier, Make, Zoho CRM, Hubspot, Google Sheets, Airtable, Pipedrive, Google Analytics, and more.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
